name: MaFl_SsoTta
oralText: I love SUSHI! I could eat it all day, every day!
introText: Making Sushi is a fine art, you see. You don;t just boil some rice, cut up some raw fish, and wrap it in seaweed, ya' know? You have to put your heart into it. You have to LOVE it!
byeText: You'll ever find better sushi anywhere in Madrigal!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: Hey there, you look a little hungry! My name is Ssotta Ssegakku and I am the best sushi cook in al of Madrigal! Hang tight, I'll whip up some Naga Rolls just for you!

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: You'll ever find better sushi anywhere in Madrigal!
